name: Orient Flights Aviation Academy (OFAA)
about: Orient Flights Aviation Academy (OFAA), located in Mysore, is a renowned pilot training establishment approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA), Government of India. Part of the Hindustan Group of Institutions, OFAA offers a range of courses including Commercial Pilot License, Private Pilot License, Student Pilot License, and specialized training in Cabin Crew, Ground Staff, and IATA Airline Customer Service. The academy is equipped with modern infrastructure, including a fleet of Cessna 152, Cessna 172, and Piper Seneca IV aircraft. Emphasizing safety and advanced technological methods, OFAA provides comprehensive training and career placement services, connecting students with reputed airlines. With a strong alumni network and a commitment to quality education, OFAA has been recognized as the Best Flying Training Organisation in India at the Global Icon Awards 2024. OFAA is dedicated to fostering the next generation of aviation professionals.
